title: Tabechatta tte Ii no ni na! (You Can Enjoy!)
synopsis: You Can Enjoy! is a surreal and easy-going comedy cartoon created to introduce Fukushima prefectureâ€™s wonderful agricultural and marine products to the whole world. The story is set in Farm Academy on Happy Island where the products are studying hard preparing for shipment.
